API¶

This part contains the API documentation of the module.

Submodules¶

  • retask.queue
  • retask.task

Exceptions¶

exception retask.RetaskException¶

Some ambiguous exception occurred

exception retask.ConnectionError¶

A Connection error occurred.

Retask is a simple task queue implementation written for human beings. It provides generic solution to create and manage task queues.
